title: Leadership Competency Development for Building Organizational Learning Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organizational workflow processes
context.additional_context: Emphasis on designing organizational learning systems applicable to mathematics education settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain the organizational learning cycle (knowledge creation-learning-sharing-application) using a mathematical framework.
Learners can derive at least three organizational learning barriers through leadership style analysis.
Learners can develop a mathematical decision-making model (applying optimization theory) for designing collaborative learning environments.
Learners can construct a quantitative indicator system (data-driven KPIs) for evaluating learning culture.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
